document_data.mainbody:
Nezrams tower was once the home of the powerful Mulhorandi wizard named Nezram.
The tower was found along the outskirts of Azun on the western shore of the Lake of Salt.
Nezrams tower was destroyed by the green dragon Chaathuuladroth in the . The treasure contained within the tower was looted both by the dragon and later by Nezrams descendants. However, the lure of potential hidden powerful magic items lured many adventurers to explore the ruins centuries after its destruction.
